messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning]husbands was: I'm new here and could use some help
messages.msgSnippet: ... I know my husband is happy and has a good job as well, he also loved college.  Sometimes he does wonder if what he is doing is because it is  truly what he
messages.messageBody:
>For example: My husand says he was forced to
>learn and he turned out great. Well he did turn out great. He got a
>good education, and makes a lot of money, and is a happy man.<<<<<



I know my husband is happy and has a good job as well, he also loved
college. Sometimes he does wonder if what he is doing is because it is truly what
he would have chosen if he had been left alone to choose or if he was swayed
by family. He does enjoy his job but it is all he knows. He will sometimes
wonder if he had not had that influence would there have been something else
that he would have loved even more. He sometimes wonders if he grew up in an
environment close to what we are trying to do for our children would he have
followed a different path. Was there a path out there that he was meant to
be on and he got sidetracked by school, family pressures etc.

Pam G


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
